document_title: Acute gastritis: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_name: viem-da-day-cap.json_5_Are complications of acute gastritis dangerous?
subsection_content: Acute gastritis, if not treated promptly, can lead to ulcers or bleeding. In addition, in a few cases, the disease also increases the risk of stomach cancer, especially when the mucosa layer is thin.
subsection_title: viem da day cap.json. Are complications of acute gastritis dangerous?
subsection_data:
viem da day cap.json. Are complications of acute gastritis dangerous?
Acute gastritis, if not treated promptly, can lead to ulcers or bleeding. In addition, in a few cases, the disease also increases the risk of stomach cancer, especially when the mucosa layer is thin.
